item.title: Newcastle to face Qarabag in Champions League play-offs
item.description: Newcastle will play Qarabag in a two-legged play-off to reach the last 16 of the Champions League.

item.title: Millions to get Â£150 off energy bills for further five years
item.description: The government has confirmed the discount for six million low-income households will continue for the rest of the decade.

item.title: Maya Jama and Ruben Dias' Cheshire home targeted by burglars
item.description: Jama was in South Africa filming Love Island and Dias was watching his team Manchester City play.

item.title: Syria's Kurds sense US betrayal as government forces push them back
item.description: The US fought IS with the Kurds for years. Now, Donald Trump is siding with Syria's new leader.

item.title: 'She's done a great job' - Donald Trump praises Melania's documentary
item.description: US First Lady Melania Trump and her husband President Donald Trump have walked the black carpet at the premier of her new documentary.
